langModel

Interface LanguageModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MyLaplaceLanguageModel, MyNaiveLanguageModel

    public interface LanguageModel
    Interface LanguageModel: interface to describe a language model.
    Author:
    N. Hernandez and S. Quiniou (2015)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getLMOrder()
      Getter of the language model order.
      java.lang.Double getNgramProb(java.lang.String ngram)
      Method computing and returning the probability of the given n-gram, using the NgramCounts structure.
      java.lang.Double getSentenceProb(java.lang.String sentence)
      Method computing and returning the probability of the given sentence, according to its n-grams.
      int getVocabularySize()
      Getter of the size of the vocabulary.
      void setNgramCounts(NgramCounts ngramCounts)
      Setter associating the current language model to a NgramCounts object.

    • Method Detail

      • setNgramCounts

        void setNgramCounts(NgramCounts ngramCounts)
        Setter associating the current language model to a NgramCounts object. It also scans the set of ngrams of the ngram counts structure and builds a vocabulary with it.
        Parameters:
        ngramCounts: - the NgramCounts object to set.

      • getLMOrder

        int getLMOrder()
        Getter of the language model order. In practice it will get the maximal order of the NgramCounts structure.
        Returns:
        the maximal order of the language model.

      • getVocabularySize

        int getVocabularySize()
        Getter of the size of the vocabulary.
        Returns:
        the size of the vocabulary.

      • getNgramProb

        java.lang.Double getNgramProb(java.lang.String ngram)
        Method computing and returning the probability of the given n-gram, using the NgramCounts structure. An implementation can consider the Laplace backoff smoothing. Another one can compute the log-probability instead of the probability...
        Parameters:
        ngram: - the n-gram whose probability to compute.
        Returns:
        the probability of the given n-gram.

      • getSentenceProb

        java.lang.Double getSentenceProb(java.lang.String sentence)
        Method computing and returning the probability of the given sentence, according to its n-grams.
        Parameters:
        sentence: - the sentence whose probability to compute.
        Returns:
        the probability of the given sentence.
